title: Is it time for a malygos, Boards Tier list yet
body: you think it'll happen later or sooner

replies.body: Considering it was from Mythos/King Thrym and not Furret, I'm not sure it'll ever happen.
> Considering it was from Mythos/King Thrym and not Furret, I'm not sure it'll ever happen.
The list is gonna be like 5 lines long too, most GD'ers are not using Board, at least in no way as regular as how they were using forum.

We got it, but the mod removed it later.

Shame, our mod no like fun stuff.
Its good to see some people still here at least, even dianasgotswag is here, i think tomato left
